name: FrogWare!
description:
A WarioWare inspired game where you go through the life cycle of a frog.

The game contains 4 mini games, hatching, eating algae, eating flies, and competing with another frog.

You use either spacebar or the mouse to control them.

(HEADPHONES WARNING the audio can be a little loud so turn down your volume a bit before playing).

Enjoy! Any feedback is appreciated!
